title: Synesthesia
content: I worked at Synesthesia for a while and it was fun while it lasted

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.content: Synesthesia is a music player that visualizes music in a 3D space. The user can explore the music in a 3D environment and interact with the music in a way that is not possible with traditional music players.

sections.title: Built-in Editor
sections.content: Synesthesia is built with React, Three.js, and Web Audio API.

sections.title: Marketplace
sections.content: I helped design and build the majority of the in-app marketplace. Additionally I oversaw its growth and managed the artists and developers that contributed their works for sale.
